techmeme.title: At OpenAI's DevDay, Sam Altman and Jony Ive spoke in vague terms about the "family of devices" currently under development; Altman says "it will take a while" (Wired)
Sources: NYSE owner Intercontinental Exchange is in talks to invest $2B in Polymarket in a deal that could value it at between $8B and $10B (Wall Street Journal)
A look at the OpenAI-AMD partnership, which added ~$78B to AMD's market cap and shows OpenAI is good at deals; OpenAI deals also boosted Shopify and Etsy stocks (Matt Levine/Bloomberg)
UK police dismantle an international gang suspected of smuggling up to 40K stolen smartphones from the UK to China, arrest 18 suspects, and recover 2,000 phones (Sima Kotecha/BBC)
Jaguar Land Rover plans to resume some UK production after a cyberattack in August; an analyst says the hack wiped out £5M in daily profit and delayed 30K+ cars (William Wilkes/Bloomberg)
